text: "One Night Affair" is a 1969 song by the O'Jays. It was released on the Neptune Records label. It is cited as one of the first disco songs. . ==Jerry Butler version== In 1972, Jerry Butler released a cover of the song . ==Asha Puthli version== Asha Puthli recorded a cover of this song on her 1975 second solo album titled "She Loves to Hear the Music" released on the CBS Columbia Label ==References== Category:1969 songs Category:The O'Jays songs Category:Rhythm and blues songs
title: One Night Affair
